title: Down the up ladder
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke, George Cass and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Traces the history and current professional development of marine engineering in Australia. Profiles the work aboard a large ferry, a naval destroyer and a hydrofoil. Also examines the role of electronics in mechanical systems.
creator_credit_for_label: Chris O’Rourke, George Cass and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
